bibl.title: The Metamorphosis of Magic from Late Antiquity to the Early Modern Period
bibl.note: The magos between coercion and otherworldliness. - The divine parhedros: acquisition and functionality. - The parhedroi: rites and forms. - The parhedros in a human shape. - The parhedros assimilated to a deity. - The parhedros as physical object. - The parhedros as daimon. - The exception of the Berlin papyrus [P.G.M. I, No. I]: elements of ignota pietas? - Conclusion.
SCIBILIA Anna, Supernatural Assistance in the Greek Magical Papyri: The Figure of the Parhedros.
